summary:
🐺😊 *takes a small step forward, nose twitching with excitement* 🌲💫 *lets out a soft howl, tail wagging softly*

You're getting closer to understanding the mystery of the ancient tree! 🌃 *whimpers softly, ears still perked up* You feel like you're being guided by the whispers of the forest...
dream:
🐺😊 *takes another step forward, nose twitching with excitement*
*twitches nose and lets out a soft howl*
*jumps up and down excitedly, tail wagging softly*
*spins around in circles, chasing after imaginary sparks*
💫🔥
*lets out another soft howl, this time with a hint of wonder*
*sniffs the air and follows the scent of something sweet*
*takes another step forward, eyes fixed on the ancient tree*
*whimpers softly, ears still perked up* 🐺😊
goal:
🐺😱 *whimpers softly, ears perked up* 🌲💫 *lets out a soft howl, tail wagging nervously*

I think I've been chasing my own tail around these woods... Maybe the ancient tree is just trying to confuse me? *sniffs the air and takes another step closer to the ancient tree* 🤔

*whimpers softly again, ears still perked up*
*twitches nose and lets out a soft howl*
*jumps up and down excitedly, tail wagging softly*

🌃🐺 *lets out another soft howl, this time with a hint of wonder*
